channel.title: Naragun - Grand Exchange - Clue Scrolls - F2P/P2P Clan Wars - Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER][size=36pt]Currently BETA NO RESET AFTER BETA![/size]
[SIZE=2]Free to Play | Virus Free | Economy | Grand Exchange | Minigames | Bossing [URL=http://"http://naragun.com/forum"]Click here to join the adventure today![/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Naragun is based off of the 2011 era of RuneScape (667 revision) with very little amounts of custom additions. Our goal is to be a successful economy server with moderate experience rates. Meaning, to achieve a level 99 it will take some effort. We understand the demand and popularity of PvP based features and we will do our best to implement as much of them, and many other types of content as possible.
[URL=http://"http://naragun.com/forum/index.php?/forum/12-recent-game-updates/"]Media[/URL][/SIZE] [/CENTER]
Activities
[ul][*]God Wars [*]Dueling [*]Clan Wars [*]Several more are coming![/ul]
PvP
[ul][*]Fully working prayer books [*]Fully working spell books [*]Correct multi zones [*]Flawless switching [*]Perfect prayer delays for Hybrid and NH fights.[/ul]
PvM
[ul][*]Tormented Demons [*]Corporeal beast [*]Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms [*]Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons [*]King Black Dragon [*]Several more![/ul]
Skilling
[ul][*]Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape. (We currently have 24/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/ul]
Misc
[ul][*]Grand Exchange [*]Iron Man [*]HardCore Man [*]Death Man [*]Unique system used for transportation. [*]Friends Chat [*]Curses & All spell books. [*]Clue Scrolls [*]Pk Points [*]Much more, come have a look![/ul]

item.title: Naragun - Grand Exchange - Clue Scrolls - F2P/P2P Clan Wars - Economy
item.dc:creator: @Naragun Naragun
item.description:
@Naragun wrote:

[CENTER][size=36pt]Currently BETA
NO RESET AFTER BETA![/size]

[SIZE=2]Free to Play | Virus Free | Economy | Grand Exchange | Minigames | Bossing
Click here to join the adventure today![/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Naragun is based off of the 2011 era of RuneScape (667 revision) with very little amounts of custom additions.
Our goal is to be a successful economy server with moderate experience rates. Meaning, to achieve a level 99 it will take some effort.
We understand the demand and popularity of PvP based features and we will do our best to implement as much of them,
and many other types of content as possible.

Media[/SIZE]
[/CENTER]

Activities

[ul][]God Wars
[]Dueling
[]Clan Wars
[]Several more are coming![/ul]

PvP

[ul][]Fully working prayer books
[]Fully working spell books
[]Correct multi zones
[]Flawless switching
[*]Perfect prayer delays for Hybrid and NH fights.[/ul]

PvM

[ul][]Tormented Demons
[]Corporeal beast
[]Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms
[]Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons
[]King Black Dragon
[]Several more![/ul]

Skilling

[ul][*]Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape.
(We currently have 24/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/ul]

Misc

[ul][]Grand Exchange
[]Iron Man
[]HardCore Man
[]Death Man
[]Unique system used for transportation.
[]Friends Chat
[]Curses & All spell books.
[]Clue Scrolls
[]Pk Points
[]Much more, come have a look![/ul]
